se.ltu.android.demo
Class DemoGLSurfaceView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.SurfaceView
          se.ltu.android.demo.GLSurfaceView
              se.ltu.android.demo.DemoGLSurfaceView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.hardware.SensorEventListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
public class DemoGLSurfaceView
extends GLSurfaceView
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener

Our application specific implementation of a GLSurfaceView. It holds the renderer and it listens to all input and sensor events spawned by the underlying OS.

Version:
$Revision: 24 $
Author:
